title: Weather App
description: Developed a real-time weather application using React that integrates with the Open Weather API to display temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions with a responsive and dynamic user interface.

title: Grocify Website
description: A grocery shopping website built with React where users can search products, view details, add items to the cart, and place orders through a simple checkout. It has a clean design, works on mobile and desktop, and updates the cart in real time for a smooth shopping experience.

title: Indian Railway
description: A Smart Railway and Waste Segregation web app built with React that promotes cleaner travel. Users can explore trains, interact with digital railway features, and learn about smart waste management. The app has a modern UI, works across desktop and mobile, and makes railway journeys more sustainable and engaging.
